name: WOKing Restaurant
address: 20531 Douglas Cres, Langley, BC V3A 4N3, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Any Three Items of Your Choice
hasMenuItem.description: Choose any three: Chow mein with chicken, fried rice with pork, chicken or pork in sweet & sour sauce, lemon or almond chicken, prawns (4pcs), beef or mushroom chop suey, pork with dry garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: 9. Wonton Soup / 雲吞湯
hasMenuItem.description: Light broth with delicate wontons, available in small or large sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: 10. Wor Wonton / 窩雲吞
hasMenuItem.description: Wor wonton soup with options for small or large servings.

hasMenuItem.name: 91. Chicken Chow Mein / 雞絲炒麵
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried egg noodles with shredded chicken, bean sprouts, cabbage, and onions, typically includes a mix of traditional Chinese seasonings.

hasMenuItem.name: Dinner for 3
hasMenuItem.description: Pork fried rice, chicken chow mein, beef chop suey, boneless sweet & sour pork, 3 egg rolls.

hasMenuItem.name: 69. Breaded Almond Chicken (Boneless) / 杏仁酥鸡
hasMenuItem.description: Breaded chicken, typically boneless, coated in crushed almonds and fried until crispy.

hasMenuItem.name: 23. 牛肉百加利 / Beef and Broccoli
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried beef and broccoli, typically includes a mix of vegetables in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Any Two Items of Your Choice
hasMenuItem.description: Choose any two from: chow mein, fried rice, sweet & sour dishes, lemon or almond chicken, fried prawns, chop suey variations, garlic pork. Mix and match for a tailored meal.

hasMenuItem.name: 49. Dry Garlic Boneless Pork / 蒜子 猪肉
hasMenuItem.description: Boneless pork seasoned with dry garlic, prepared to highlight the natural flavors of the pork with a hint of garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: 47. Pineapple Sweet & Sour Boneless Pork / 甜酸咕嚕肉
hasMenuItem.description: Crisp boneless pork and pineapple chunks wok-tossed in a tangy sweet-and-sour sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 68. Sweet & Sour Chicken Balls / 甜酸 鸡球
hasMenuItem.description: Battered chicken balls served with a sweet and sour sauce, often accompanied by pineapple for a tangy twist.

hasMenuItem.name: 97. Woking Special Chow Mein (Soft Noodle) / 招牌炒麵
hasMenuItem.description: Soft noodles stir-fried with a combination of meats and vegetables, following the traditional Woking style.

hasMenuItem.name: 1. Egg Roll (1) / 炸春卷
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy egg roll wrap filled with minced pork and cabbage, deep-fried to a golden brown.

hasMenuItem.name: 2. Mini Spring Roll (6 Pieces) / 迷你春卷
hasMenuItem.description: Mini spring rolls, served in a set of six, are delicately wrapped and fried to achieve a crispy exterior, typically filled with a mix of vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: 7. Pan-Fried Dumplings (8 Pieces) / 煎鍋貼
hasMenuItem.description: Crispy on one side, tender on the other, these pan-fried dumplings are filled with a savory mixture, offering a delightful contrast in texture. Eight pieces per serving.

hasMenuItem.name: 5. Lettuce Wrap (Chicken, Beef or Pork) / 生菜包
hasMenuItem.description: Lettuce wrap with choice of chicken, beef, or pork. Served with crisp lettuce leaves for wrapping.

hasMenuItem.name: 6. B.B.Q Pork / 蜜汁叉燒
hasMenuItem.description: Tender slices of pork, traditionally marinated and roasted with a honey glaze, known as char siu in Chinese cuisine.

hasMenuItem.name: 9. Wonton Soup / 雲吞湯
hasMenuItem.description: Light broth with delicate wontons, available in small or large sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: 10. Wor Wonton / 窩雲吞
hasMenuItem.description: Wor wonton soup with options for small or large servings.

hasMenuItem.name: 12. Chinese Noodle Soup / 牛肉湯麵
hasMenuItem.description: Choice of beef, chicken or B.B.Q pork.

hasMenuItem.name: 13. Cream Corn with Chicken Soup / 雞茸粟米羹
hasMenuItem.description: Minced chicken and sweet corn in a thickened broth, often enriched with egg.

hasMenuItem.name: 14. Hot & Sour Soup / 酸辣湯
hasMenuItem.description: Hot and Sour Soup typically includes a spicy and sour broth filled with tofu, bamboo shoots, mushrooms, and egg, seasoned with vinegar and pepper.

hasMenuItem.name: 8. Consommé Soup / 清 湯
hasMenuItem.description: Clear broth, available in small or large.

hasMenuItem.name: 11. Mushroom Egg Swirl Soup with Chicken / 蘑菇蛋花湯
hasMenuItem.description: Mushroom egg swirl soup with chicken combines chicken broth, mushrooms, and whisked eggs, gently cooked to create delicate egg ribbons.

hasMenuItem.name: 15. Beef Chop Suey / 牛肉雜菜
hasMenuItem.description: Beef chop suey typically consists of sliced beef stir-fried with a variety of vegetables such as bean sprouts, onions, and carrots in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 16. Chinese Green (Bok Choy) with Garlic / 蒜蓉白菜
hasMenuItem.description: Bok choy stir-fried with garlic, often presented in a light sauce to enhance the natural flavors of the greens.

hasMenuItem.name: 17. Beef & Chinese Green (Bok Choy) / 牛 肉 白菜
hasMenuItem.description: Sliced beef and bok choy stir-fried, typically includes a variety of complementary vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: 18. Chicken Chop Suey / 雞片 雜菜
hasMenuItem.description: Chicken chop suey typically includes stir-fried chicken mixed with a variety of vegetables such as bean sprouts, mushrooms, and seasonal greens in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 20. B.B.Q Pork Chop Suey / 叉燒雜菜
hasMenuItem.description: Barbecue pork stir-fried with bean sprouts, mushrooms, carrots, and mixed vegetables.

hasMenuItem.name: 21. Stir-Fried Mixed Vegetables (No Meat) / 清炒雜菜
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried mixed vegetables feature a medley of fresh vegetables, typically including broccoli, carrots, mushrooms, and snow peas, lightly tossed in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 23. 牛肉百加利 / Beef and Broccoli
hasMenuItem.description: Stir-fried beef and broccoli, typically includes a mix of vegetables in a savory sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: 25. Almond Gai Ding (Diced Veg. & Chicken) / 杏仁雞丁
hasMenuItem.description: Diced chicken and vegetables, typically including almonds, lightly sautéed in a traditional Chop Suey style.

hasMenuItem.name: 26. Cashew Gai Ding (Diced Veg. & Chicken) / 腰果雞丁

hasMenuItem.name: 28. Prawns with Cashew & Diced Vegetables / 腰果蝦丁

hasMenuItem.name: 27. Prawns with Almond & Diced Vegetables / 杏仁蝦丁

hasMenuItem.description: Tender chicken and mushrooms stir fried with a variety of vegetables and bean sprouts, following traditional Chop Suey preparation methods.

hasMenuItem.name: 22. Woking Special Chop Suey / 招牌雜菜
hasMenuItem.description: Woking special chop suey typically includes a stir-fried medley of chicken, bbq pork, shrimp, and assorted vegetables, served in a savory sauce.

hasMenuSection.name: Egg Fu Yung (Gravy on Side) / 芙蓉類

hasMenuItem.name: 30. Mushroom Foo Yung / 蘑菇芙蓉

hasMenuItem.description: Shrimp foo young is a Chinese omelette that typically includes shrimp, egg, and a medley of vegetables such as cabbage and bean sprouts, served with a side of gravy.

hasMenuItem.description: Scrambled eggs combined with a selection of meats and vegetables, served with a side of gravy.

review.reviewBody:
this food was so delicious, I've been trying all the different types of Chinese food restaurants here in Langley for years. I thought I'm going to try this place. Let me tell you the almond chicken so flaky and not greasy. same with the pork fried rice. lots of meat in it and not greasy. The war wonton soup so tasty And snow peas in it broccoli chicken prawn meat. so yummy..
this place is my go-to for Chinese food food from this point forward
